title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah: Key Terror Commanders Eliminated in Major Air Assault”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF eliminated the terrorist Ali Jafar Ma’touk, a unit commander in the operations field of the Hezbollah terror organization’s Radwan force, along with another commander who was alongside him.

Fighter jets attacked this evening a headquarters of the Radwan force, where terrorists from the Hezbollah terror organization were present in the Jumjumah area, along with another headquarters of the organization in the Majdal Selim area.

In the attack, the unit commander in the operations field of the Radwan force, terrorist Ali Jafar Ma’touk, was eliminated, along with another operations commander, in the Hajir sector of the Radwan force. The terrorists had planned several attacks targeting Israeli territory. Additionally, several other terrorists from the Radwan force who were operating in buildings were also eliminated in the attack.

Furthermore, fighter jets attacked a military structure of the Hezbollah terror organization in the Shakra area.

Attached is documentation from the attacks: https://we.tl/t-jRQfgSRXXy
